thread.section_title: HomeAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HomeAdvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 12 of 411
thread.title: Christine G

author: Christine G
title: Christine G
text: This was my first experience with Homeadvisor. My light switch in a bathroom without windows broke so I needed an electrician quickly. The process to find an electrician in my area was very easy. Homeadvisor calls you to connect you with a service provider however I didn't answer my phone because the number was from Colorado and I am in NJ. I assumed I would get a call from a local number. They really need to let you know this upfront as many of us today don't answer calls from numbers we don't know. And since they couldn't reach me, I was provided with contact information for the service company and several other options. Overall, I would use Homeadvisor, and the service provider they recommended, again.
